title: Chem Trails - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/14/17
itunes:title: Chem Trails - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/14/17
description:
George Noory and guest Dr. J. Marvin Herndon discuss his research into the chem trail phenomenon, whether weather manipulation is to blame for the California wildfires and if he fears for his safety while he exposes the truth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
